description: 1 x London Plane (applicants ref. T4) - Crown raise over car park only. Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Lime (applicants ref. T5) - Reduce crown on one side to BS3998 standards to allow access for crane. Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Lime (applicants ref. T6) - Again reduce only one side to BS3998 standard and don't top. Crown raise all lower crown by 1m. Tree will recover well as limes are quite resilient. Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Cherry (applicants ref. T9) - Reduce back from building by 0.5m. Only near window.  Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Cherry (applicants ref T10) - Fell and don't replant.  Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Weeping Willow (applicants ref. T13) - Reduce back from building by 2m.  Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Oak (applicants ref. Third Party Tree) - Reduce back from building 3m. Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Cedar (applicants ref. Third Party Tree) - Crown raise over car park only. Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Ornamental Peach (applicants ref. G5) - Remove deadwood near pagoda. Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Cherry,1 x Silver Birch, 1 x Norway Maple (applicants ref. G6) - Fell one tree in decline, marked "fell". Remove deadwood from Cherry with dieback, marked "deadwood". Standing in A1 of Tree Preservation Order.
